title: Can someone explain how this hostel system works?
content:
I have made the hostel payment 2 weeks ago (approx) however haven't been calledbfor any briefing session yet.


Am I missing something here? Should I mail the pesu warden?

comments.body: Bro the briefing session was completed for me around 2 weeks back. Even I didn't get a call from them one of my frnd told me abt it. Ig u shd call the warden once and reserve ur slot for briefing session
Yes same case but I don't live in banglore so do I have to come for this seperately or will I get the briefing on the day of hostel joining
No u hv to come before joining

bruh briefing session is nothing , they jus tell you about the rules and shit!   
i too live very far so hostel is the way   
you jus need to report 2 days prior to the starting of college to get your room sorted and stuff
can anyone help me by providing the contact no of EC campus warden?
